name: Street Race: Skybridge Dash
desc: High-speed hover-limo lanes turned into illegal race tracks.

name: Data Heist: Boardroom Breach
desc: Jack into corp intranets from a rooftop relay.

name: Cargo Smash & Grab
desc: Ambush a convoy moving through the Rustline markets.

name: Parkour: Neon Hops
desc: Chain wall-runs across holo-billboards and rusted catwalks.

name: Drone Delivery: Night Shift
desc: Spoof waypoints and deliver contraband quietly.

name: Underhollow Hunt: Echo-Beast
desc: Track and neutralize a mutated creature in the fog.

name: Arena: Shockglove Circuit
desc: Bare-knuckle cyber bouts with EMP hazards.

name: ATM Siphon
desc: Discreetly breach ATM clusters for credits.

name: Camera Scrub: Clean the Scene
desc: Erase evidence after a high-profile job.
